props.name: alignX
props.description: Horizontal alignment of the tab strip (horizontal orientation).

props.name: orientation
props.description: Layout direction for the tab strip and panel.

props.name: placement
props.description: Which side the tab strip sits on relative to the panel.

props.name: active
props.description: Controlled index of the active tab.

props.name: onTabChange
props.description: Callback when the active tab changes.

props.name: preset
props.description: Apply style presets to the container.

props.name: sx
props.description: Inline style overrides (CSS object; supports CSS vars).
